summary: Defines a FastAPI web server that manages OAuth authentication flows and credential retrieval for multiple third‑party services (e.g., Google, GitHub, Slack, Spotify, Dropbox, Discord) and exposes endpoints that can interact with an execution engine for running code.
business_intent: Enable a client application to securely obtain access tokens for external services and to trigger code execution through a centralized backend, supporting integration with various platforms and simplifying authentication handling.
